nodes.text: Armorply plating, simply known as Armorply was a type of armor.

Armorply was an armored cloth that could be tailored thin or thick for different levels of protection, in garments ranging from full suits to protective vests. Offering protection against energy and physical attacks, Armorply was worn when suppleness and flexibility was needed, and was considered a military grade material.
In KotOR II, this upgrade can be used on all types armor, except for robes.
